metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12407 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A buffer overflow occurs when drawing and validating elements with the ANGLE graphics library, used for WebGL content, when working with the VertexBuffer11 module. This results in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 64.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12407` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 64.0+build3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 64.0+build3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 64.0+build3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 64.0+build3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '64.0+build3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
